p: Blood/virus mixtures were titrated as serial ten-fold dilutions in 96 well microtiter plates seeded with confluent monolayers of C6/36 cells. Plates were incubated at 28°C for 10 d before being fixed in PBS/acetone and stored at -20°C. Infection with ZIKV was detected using a cell culture enzyme immunoassay (CC-EIA; [ 23]) and the pan-flavivirus reactive monoclonal antibody 4G2 (provided by Roy Hall, University of Queensland, Australia).
